title: [安全][修正]AntiCheatReloaded —— 让你的服务器内少一些作弊者[1.9.x-1.10.x]
author: 幻境雲達達
txt_content:

replies.author: UltraPanda
replies.txt_content:
标题: [安全][修正]AntiCheatReloaded —— 让你的服务器内少一些作弊者[1.9.x-1.10.x] 本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 18:10 编辑 
<AntiCheatReloaded>
一款开源以及很牛的反作弊重置版插件...

它是什么?<AntiCheat的续作，的重置版。这款插件比AntiCheat多了很多功能>
<AntiCheat容易被某些端直接跳过。则AntiCheatReloaded不同


  他能干一些什么？
Spioer [攀爬方块]
 FastBreak [快速破坏方块]
 FastPlace [快速放置方块] 
NoSwing [手臂不摇摆] 
HighJump [高跳] 
Autotool [自动工具] 
Nuker [核弹，相当于FastBreak]
 Fly [飞行] 
Spam [刷屏] 
NoSlowDown [在灵魂沙上走路不减速等]
 Builo [快速建造]
 NoFall [无掉落伤害]
 Vclip [穿墙]
 Sneak [蹲着走不减速] 
Step [无需跳跃直接走上一格高的方块]
 Flight [飞行]
 Jesus [水上漂] 
Speed [加速]
 JedPack [相当于飞行]
 Regen [快速回血]
 Fast Bow [快速射弓箭]
Killaura1.10 [杀戮光环[只有1.10版本]]




插件的作者已经将此插件开源,遵守Github的开源规则.地址:
https://github.com/Rammelkast/AntiCheatReloaded


权限[未汉化,英语能力不行,有能力的帮忙汉化一下]
In-depth permissions:anticheat.system.notice: See broadcasts when a player is kicked or banned for hacking
anticheat.system.alert: See alerts when a player might be cheating
anticheat.system.help: Access the help message
anticheat.system.report: Access cheat reports
anticheat.system.spy: Access the spy system
anticheat.system.xray: Access info about xray usage
anticheat.system.log: Access turning console logging on or off
anticheat.system.reload: Access reloading the system
anticheat.system.reset: Access resetting a player's cheat level
anticheat.system.update: Access information about whether the system is updated
anticheat.system.calibrate: Access the calibration system
anticheat.system.debug: Access debug reportsCheck PermissionsInstructions: Give a player any of these permissions and they will automatically bypass the corresponding check. If you want to allow a player to bypass all the checks, give themanticheat.check.exempt.anticheat.check.zombe.fly: Allow players to use zombe flymod
anticheat.check.zombe.noclip: Allow players to use zombe noclip hack
anticheat.check.zombe.cheat: Allow players to use zombe cheat hack
anticheat.check.fly: Allow players to fly
anticheat.check.waterwalk: Allow players to walk on water
anticheat.check.noswing: Allow players to not ever swing their arm
anticheat.check.fastbreak: Allow players to quickly break blocks
anticheat.check.fastplace: Allow players to use build hacks and fastplace
anticheat.check.spam: Allow players to spam the server
anticheat.check.sprint: Allow players to sprint when hungry
anticheat.check.sneak: Allow players to use auto-sneak
anticheat.check.speed: Allow players to speed
anticheat.check.spider: Allow players to climb non-climbable surfaces
anticheat.check.nofall: Allow players to avoid fall damage
anticheat.check.fastbow: Allow players to quickly fire bows
anticheat.check.fasteat: Allow players to eat food instantly
anticheat.check.fastheal: Allow players to heal up instantly
anticheat.check.forcefield: Allow players to use a forcefield
anticheat.check.xray: Allow players to bypass xray stats
anticheat.check.longreach: Allow players to use longreaching hacks
anticheat.check.projectile: Allow players to quickly launch projectiles
anticheat.check.itemspam: Allow players to use inventory drop spam hacks
anticheat.check.visual: Allow players to interact with objects out of their view
anticheat.check.vclip: Allow players to become slimeballs and clip down through blocks
anticheat.check.fastinventory: Allow players to use fastloot and similar inventory hacks
anticheat.check.autotool: Allow players to use autotool to switch tools quickly
anticheat.check.fastanimation: Allow players to attack or interact very quicklyanticheat.check.exempt: Allow a player to bypass any check

服务端版本:1.9.x-1.10.x

赶紧用它来处理那些作弊玩家吧！

已经进行轻度汉化....

replies.author: BenLi豪
replies.txt_content: 知道滑翔那个就会会带原地的 配置在哪吗？？？求教谢谢。我找不到

replies.author: z我的新
replies.txt_content: 楼主可以反变速齿轮吗

翻译如下:
anticheat.system.notice！当玩家被踢出或禁止黑客攻击时，请参见广播
anticheat.system.alert！看到玩家可能作弊的警报
anticheat.system.help！访问帮助消息
anticheat.system.report！访问备忘报告
anticheat.system.spy！进入间谍系统
anticheat.system.xray！关于x射线用法的访问信息
anticheat.system.log！访问控制台登录或关闭
anticheat.system.reload！访问重新加载系统
anticheat.system.reset！重置玩家的作弊关卡
anticheat.system.update！访问有关系统是否更新的信息
anticheat.system.calibrate！进入校准系统
anticheat.system.debug！访问调试报告
检查权限
指令！给玩家任何一个权限，他们会自动绕过相应的检查。如果你想让一个球员绕过所有的检查，给themanticheat.check.exempt.
anticheat.check.zombe.fly！允许玩家使用zombe
anticheat.check.zombe.noclip！允许玩家使用zombenoclip黑客
anticheat.check.zombe.cheat！允许玩家使用zombe作弊黑客
anticheat.check.fly！允许玩家飞翔
anticheat.check.waterwalk！让玩家在水上行走
anticheat.check.noswing！允许玩家不要挥动手臂
anticheat.check.fastbreak！允许玩家快速突破盖帽
anticheat.check.fastplace！允许玩家使用构建攻击和fastplace
anticheat.check.spam！允许玩家垃圾邮件服务器
anticheat.check.sprint！让玩家在饥饿时冲刺
anticheat.check.sneak！允许玩家使用自动潜行
anticheat.check.speed！允许玩家速度
anticheat.check.spider！允许玩家攀登非爬得上去的的表面
anticheat.check.nofall！允许玩家避免坠落伤害
anticheat.check.fastbow！允许玩家快速开火弓
anticheat.check.fasteat！允许玩家立即吃食物
anticheat.check.fastheal！让玩家立即痊愈
anticheat.check.forcefield！允许玩家使用力场
anticheat.check.xray！允许玩家跳过x射线统计
anticheat.check.longreach！允许玩家使用longreaching哈克斯
anticheat.check.projectile！允许玩家快速发射炮弹
anticheat.check.itemspam！允许玩家使用清单丢弃垃圾邮件
anticheat.check.visual！允许玩家与他们的视图中的对象交互
anticheat.check.vclip！允许玩家成为slimeballs，并通过块剪辑下来
anticheat.check.fastinventory！允许玩家使用fastloot和类似的清单攻击
anticheat.check.autotool！允许玩家使用autotool快速切换工具
anticheat.check.fastanimation！允许玩家快速攻击或交互
anticheat.check.exempt！允许玩家跳过任何检查

replies.author: 孤判嘞
replies.txt_content: NoSlowDown = 吃东西/拉弓/格挡不减速 NoWeb才是灵魂沙和蜘蛛网不减速
